mapper.select:
select id_ from BIZ_DEBT_MAIN
and DEBT_CODE = #{debtCode}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BIZ_DEBT_GRANT c WHERE c.PROPER_INFO=#{productId}

SELECT TO_CHAR (A .ID_) ID_, A .DEBT_CODE, A .SINGLE_BATCH, CASE A .SINGLE_BATCH WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 0 THEN '否' END SINGLE_BATCH_STRING, A .PROJECT_NAME, A .PROPOSER, A .PROPOSER_NUM, A .BANK_TELL_ID, A .PG_EFFECTIVE_DATE, A .PG_EXPI_DATE, -- A .SOLUTION_STATE, trn.BIZ_STATUS A .M_CURRENCY, A .SOLUTION_AMT, A .APPROVED_UNUSED_AMT, A .TDWLN, A . POLICY, CASE A .POLICY WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 0 THEN '否' END POLICY_STRING, C.USER_NAME, C.DEPT_CODE, D .DEPT_NAME, E .CODE_NAME, WM_CONCAT (G .NAME_) OVER (PARTITION BY A .DEBT_CODE) produceNameAll FROM BIZ_DEBT_MAIN A INNER JOIN SYS_USER C ON A .BANK_TELL_ID = C.id_ INNER JOIN SYS_DEPT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D .ID_ INNER JOIN SYS_CURRENCY E ON A .M_CURRENCY = E .MON_CODE INNER JOIN BIZ_SIGLE_PRODUCT_RULE F ON A .DEBT_CODE = F.DEBT_CODE INNER JOIN BIZ_PRODUCT_TYPES G ON F.BUSINESS_TYPE = G .CODE_ INNER JOIN BIZ_TRN trn ON (A.id_ = trn.objinr and trn.objtyp='BIZ_DEBT_MAIN' and trn.vernum_ = a.vernum_)
AND A.DEBT_CODE = #{cm.debtCode}
select * from BIZ_DEBT_MAIN WHERE DEBT_CODE = #{debtCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
